DOC.brief_summary: Endoscopic correction VUR gain popularity due less invasiveness , associate low morbidity short hospital stay . Although short term follow-up justified efficacy ; however , long term recurrence complication follow endoscopic correction also report literature ( 6 ) . Currently , insufficient evidence efficacy safety biocompatible tissue augment material use endoscopic correction VUR ; particularly new tissue bulking agent . DOC.criteria: Included patient study 1 3months > 1year posttreatment followup study void cystourethrogram ( VCUG ) , kidney ultrasound , dimercaptosuccinic acid ( DMSA ) renal scan , urine culture . Excluded case patient VUR grade 1 grade 5 , complete followup work ups , concomitant neurogenic bladder , anatomical malformation urinary tract ( obstruction , complete duplicate pelvocaliceal system ) , previous surgical endoscopic procedure , suspect confirmed dysfunctional void clinical finding abnormal result ( irregular bladder wall , diverticulum ) VCUG urodynamic study .
